|website=[http://www.myspace.com/the_masked_magician The Masked Magician's
Official MySpace] [http://www.themaskedmagician.com Masked Magician's
Official Website] }} 'Val Valentino' (born June 14, 1956) is an American
illusionist who gained fame by starring in four magic specials exposing magic
secrets on the Fox network, using the stage name the 'Masked Magician'.
